entity.name: LearningObject
entity.query: select id, added, views from LearningObject WHERE deleted = false
entity.deltaImportQuery: select id, added, views from LearningObject where id = '${dih.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: select id from LearningObject where (CONVERT_TZ(added, @@session.time_zone, '+00:00') > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}' OR CONVERT_TZ(lastInteraction, @@session.time_zone, '+00:00') > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}') AND deleted = false
entity.deletedPkQuery: select id from LearningObject where (CONVERT_TZ(added, @@session.time_zone, '+00:00') > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}' OR CONVERT_TZ(lastInteraction, @@session.time_zone, '+00:00') > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}') AND deleted = true

entity.name: TagUpVote
entity.query: select concat(t.name, '_', count(*)) as tag_up_vote from TagUpVote tuv, Tag t where tuv.tag = t.id AND tuv.learningObject = '${LearningObject.id}' AND tuv.deleted = false GROUP BY name

entity.name: LearningObject_Score
entity.query: select IFNULL(2 * SUM(ul.isLiked) - COUNT(*), 0) as like_score from UserLike ul where ul.learningObject='${LearningObject.id}'

entity.name: LearningObject_Recommended
entity.query: select r.added as recommendation_timestamp, if (lo.recommendation is not null, 1, 0) as recommended from Recommendation r right join LearningObject lo on r.id = lo.recommendation where lo.id = '${LearningObject.id}'
